page.title: 18HEALTH/POPULATION MORELEIGH
page.content:
No provision has been made in either Halwell or Moreleigh for an occasional surgery, therefore all residents have to travel to Totnes,10kms,for medical advice. The Hospital Car Service is available for those having to attend Torbay hospital. Health Visitors and District Nurses visit inhabitants when necessary. Dental treatment is available in Totnes or Kingsbridge.
POPULATION The population of Halwell is 140 - in 1850 it was over 400.
The population of Moreleigh in 1850 was 150 - today it has declined to 100.
